title: 3-Day Varna Adventure

activities.description: Take a relaxing walk in Varna's largest park, enjoying the beautiful seaside views and sculptures.
Explore Bulgariaâ€™s oldest and largest archaeological museum with artifacts dating back to ancient times.
Try Bulgarian cuisine with dishes like 'shopska salad' and 'kavarma'.
Visit this beautiful Eastern Orthodox cathedral, known for its stunning architecture and religious art.

activities.activity: Dinner and stroll around the city center
activities.description: Enjoy a dinner at a seaside restaurant and take a walk along the beach promenade.
Relax on the golden sands and swim in the Black Sea.
Enjoy a light lunch with fresh seafood and salads.
Explore local shops and boutiques for souvenirs and gifts.

activities.activity: Dinner at a traditional Bulgarian restaurant
activities.description: Experience Bulgarian folklore and music while dining on traditional dishes.

activities.activity: Visit the Balchik Palace and Botanical Garden
activities.description: Explore the beautiful grounds of the former residence of Romanian Queen Marie and enjoy the lush gardens.

activities.activity: Lunch at a local Balchik restaurant
activities.description: Sample local Bulgarian dishes and enjoy the relaxed seaside atmosphere.
Enjoy a leisurely drive back to Varna and have a quiet dinner at a seaside restaurant.

tips: Pack light beachwear and comfortable walking shoes.
Try to learn a few basic Bulgarian phrases for easier communication.
Carry sunscreen and a hat for protection from the sun.
